newsitem.title: BELGIUM: CFE falls into loss for H1 1996.
newsitem.headline: CFE falls into loss for H1 1996.

text.p: Group net (excludes minorities) loss 65 vs 94 profit
Cons current pre-tax loss 118 vs 136 profit

NOTE - Compagnie D'Entreprises CFE is a civil engineering and construction firm. It said as a result of the worsening climate in the construction sector in 1996, full year earnings would be less than those of 1995.

It said orders were at the same level as in the same period in 1995 for construction, and were higher for its dredging activities. Full-year turnover should be slightly below 1995 levels, on a comparable consolidation basis. The company expected slightly positive net consolidated earnings for the full year and a slightly reduced cashflow.
It said the fall in first half 1996 turnover versus the year ago period was partly a result of the deconsolidation of the company's participation in Wan Hin in Hong Kong.
